name: Goodnight, Lola
description:
Goodnight, Lola

An RPGmaker game about a lonely girl who finds solace in her sleep.

As she discovers more within her dreams, she is able to use her new knowledge in her real life.

WARNING: 

May contain some quickly flashing lights and movement!!

Hello there! I have made some silly things in RPG Maker in the past but this is my first time making a serious project! Its my first time trying to put together my own real project with what limited abilities I have.

As of right now, the project is around 1/2 of the way complete, not including bug testing and such. Where the game is now, a playthrough takes around 1-2 hours, so I would assume the full game will be somewhere around 3-4 hours.

Goodnight, Lola is a story driven puzzle game in which the player experiences 2 different worlds (the real world and the dream world). When visiting Lola's dreams, certain objects or learned information are used in the real world to solve puzzles/help her. However, when crossing over to the real world, certain objects in inventory or information may be changed a little bit. 

I started this game at the end of my high school career, but unfortunately, college has halted the pace of my progress and the game is not available for download yet! :(. I estimate this project will be completed around the beginning of 2024.

Story, Illustration, Pixel Art, Music by:  Sloane Taylor

Plugins Used:

Yanfly - use of MessageCore and CoreEngine pluggins 

Sasuke Kannazuki - message sound plugin 

Masked - Map zoom effect
